mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_idx, p.writer, p.category, p.title, p.content, p.post_file, p.price, p.register_date, p.readcount, r.user_id FROM post p INNER JOIN regular_user r ON p.writer = r.idx
ORDER BY p.post_idx DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from post WHERE category = #{category}
mapper.insert: insert into post (writer, category, title, content, post_file, post_original, price, register_date, readcount, status) values (#{writer}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{post_file}, #{post_original}, #{price}, current_timestamp, #{readcount}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from( select p.*, r.user_id, r.idx, r.user_file from post p join regular_user r on p.writer = r.idx order by post_idx desc ) subquery where post_idx = #{post_idx}
mapper.update: update post set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, post_file=#{post_file}, post_original=#{post_original}, status=#{status} where post_idx = #{post_idx}
